title: COUNCIL REGULATION (EC) No 683/95 of 27 March 1995 extending the 1994/95 marketing year in the beef and veal sector
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EC) No 683/95 of 27 March 1995 extending  the 1994/95 marketing year in the beef and veal sector
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN  UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community,
Having regard to Council Regulation (EEC) No 805/68 of 27 June 1968 on the common organization of  the market in beef and veal  (1), and in particular Article 4 thereof,
Having regard to the proposal from the Commission,
Whereas the intervention prices fixed in the context of the reform of the common agricultural  policy for the beef and veal sector pursuant to Article 1 of Council Regulation (EEC) No 2068/92 of  30 June 1992, fixing, for the period 1 July 1993 to 30 June 1996, the intervention prices for adult  bovine animals  (2), will apply only from 1 July 1995 for the period 1 July 1995 to 30 June 1996;  whereas the current marketing year should therefore be extended until 30 June 1995 in order to  maintain the guide and intervention prices at their existing level until the new price system is  applied,
main_body: Notwithstanding Article 4 of Regulation (EEC) No 805/68, the 1994/95  marketing year in the beef and veal sector shall end on 30 June 1995 and the 1995/96 marketing year  shall begin on 1 July 1995.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 3 April 1995.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 March 1995.
For the Council The President J. PUECH
